thread.section_title: Fraser Suites Harmonie Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice suite at La Defence area
thread.title_full: Nice suite at La Defence area - Review of Fraser Suites Harmonie Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mayya_d_z
title: Nice suite at La Defence area
text:
Close to La Defence business district, large shopping mall also open on Sundays (still a rare case in France) and metro. Room was clean, amenities are modern, however kitchen is very small and had no windows, contrary to the photos on the website. Daily cleaning service is free of charge. Location is a bit hard to find for the taxis and the view is to the motorway. Good for a business traveller but not so much for a family with kids. However nice service from the staff and good price, especially if you book directly at the hotel website.
Room Tip: ask for a room at higher floors See more room tips
